resources.string: Save the Virgins! Vampires are trying to reach the Virgins in Miss Bs School. You are the only one who can protect them! Move the weapons (bullet, hatchet and cross) up to the graveyard where the Vampires are making their way and stop them!
This is the first released version of Vampires Versus Virgins
